abstract: A hedge fund manager argues that A.I.G. stock is poised to soar, largely because he thinks the company will start manipulating earnings to make itself look good.
snippet: A hedge fund manager argues that A.I.G. stock is poised to soar, largely because he thinks the company will start manipulating earnings to make itself look good.
lead_paragraph: 5:36 p.m. | Updated with closing stock price.

headline.main: Here Comes Earnings Puffery. So Buy the Stock.
